body: After seeing so much Asuna rape doujins this feels like a godsend. Simple, vanilla, wholesome, good art, I don’t see how anyone can not like this. If you want rape ntr then go read literally any of the other thousand rape/ntr sao doujins 💀
Just finish her NTR much better!
We see asuna become a man gender bender far more interesting right?

Get lost damn mentally sick peoples...
do you like vanilla fags coming to every rape or NTR  doujin and shit post and complain why its not vanilla ?

just go and read what u like to read !

Asuna is my Fav and new Asuna x Kirito Vanilla is always a welcome addition !

btw @Theonewhocouldn'tbecomeaSage   Asuna is in Season 3, but less in the first ~25 ep,  much more in latter ~25 ep !
And she will stay with Kirito for a long long time :P
+PleaseTac his name is not God-kun its Jesus-Kun

@You_Watanawant The Fate Chars.? they are not boring because they are kinda unique, like example Saber aka Arthuria is probably the most closes one you can compare to Asuna because of their demeanor but if you place to side by side who you think you would likely be attracted to? for me Saber because how she carries herself and the fact her personality fits with her char. design, Asuna char. design doesn't fit with her personality and not only that the way she carry herself is not intriguing,interesting or it doesn't stand out really, she's like a very normal char. with perfect personality that was made into heroine and what i meant by "carry herself" the way they act.
Now try to put Saber Arthuria and Saber Nero side by side who do you think is the most interesting? for me its Nero despite having the same image with some changes *cough* *cough* the chest Nero is far more interesting and intriguing because of her daring personality of course the way she carry herself.

The reason why Asuna is boring because she doesn't stand out in anything and she doesn't have any flaws and she has the most perfect personality yet it doesn't stand out and it also doesn't fit with her image she would likely be more popular if she was a MILF etc or a more perfect image for her like being more motherly look but as a teenage with that kind image and demeanor it doesn't really fit, i prefer Sinon and Lisbeth as my heroines hell new char. in the SAO games are more interesting than Asuna.

Asuna's boring because her appeal is based on conplete perfection. She's beautiful, is a legitimate gamer girl, and has the most ideal personality traits possible for a wife.
That's all, however. A very important part of a character is their flaws. If your only flaw is not being as good as Kirito (God-kun, as he is named), then you have a shitty, basic af character.
Imperfections are indearing when they are accepted. Katawa shoujo is a game with that as the main theme and its characters (especially Hanako), are beloved.
If Asuna is basic then wtf are Fate heroines?

poster.username: i read it for the story
